title: Literary Themes
description: Literature selected according to a particular theme. Emphasis on critical interpretation, aesthetic appreciation, and historical and cultural contexts. The Schedule of Classes will list topic selected. Total credit limited to 12 units. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE C4 except for English majors. Fulfills GWR for students with junior standing (90 units). Crosslisted as ENGL/HNRSÂ 380.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Areas A and C1
